room_title: Escape room "Thomas Edison" by Storm Out in Miami
room_address: 664 E Hallandale Beach Blvd, Hallandale Beach, FL 33009
room_description:
An excursion leads you to the Thomas Edison National Historical Park. You find yourself interested in a clock display; you wonder what is so important about this clock.
As you reach closer and touch it, you get transported back in time to Edisonâ€™s locked office, finding yourself locked.
Solving his puzzles and learning about his history seem to get you closer to finding your way back to the present.
